com.github.dandelion.datatables.jsp.tag
Class AbstractColumnTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
          com.github.dandelion.datatables.jsp.tag.AbstractColumnTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.DynamicAttributes, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColumnTag
public abstract class AbstractColumnTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
implements javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.DynamicAttributes

Superclass of ColumnTag containing:

  • tag attributes declaration (note that all the corresponding setters are in the ColumnTag
  • helper attributes and methods used to initialize the column

Note that this tag supports dynamic attributes with only string values. See setDynamicAttribute(String, String, Object) below.

Since:
0.1.0
Author:
Thibault Duchateau, Enrique Ruiz
See Also:
Serialized Form

                                   String content)

Column are always marked as "header" using an AJAX source.

getColumnContent

protected String getColumnContent()
                           throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

Returns the column content when using a DOM source.

Returns:
the content to be displayed in the column.
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException - if something went wrong during the access to the bean's property or during the message formatting.
